name: Ludum Dare 45 (Noshiz)
description:
Save the city from the alien invasion.  A game made for Ludum Dare 45 in about a day.

Controls:

WASD - Controls the snowball

Mouse - Controls the camera

Left Shift - Speed Boost

R - Teleport back to last checkpoint

The windows version (you can download it below) has much better performance and a longer draw distance.

The first ever 3D game made by me (Noshiz) and MysticDuck.
